survey_name: Electric Vehicle (EV) Home Charging Station Installation Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have recently installed an EV home charging station to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and overall experience with the installation process.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall installation process of your EV home charging station?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall installation process of your EV home charging station?

questions.question_text: Which of the following challenges did you face during the installation process? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse challenges.

script.question_text: Which of the following challenges did you face during the installation process? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism and expertise of the installation team?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess service quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism and expertise of the installation team?

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional feedback or suggestions you have regarding the installation process.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional feedback or suggestions you have regarding the installation process.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our EV home charging station installation service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our EV home charging station installation service to others?
